page.title: 16TOURISM IN CLAXBY
page.content: The area is as yet undiscovered by tourists, ands those who do visit are mainly walkers. The old village school in Claxby was renovated in 1978 as part of the Silver Jubilee celerbrations and made into a youth centre. It can be booked by schools and youth groups for field trips and sleeps about 25 people. It is known as the Viking Centre. The Viking Way footpath passes through the area and is a long distance footpath from the Humber Bridge to Oakham in Leicestershire. It attracts many walkers every year.
